description.sigpatches: ◆ Sigpatches give the ability to install and launch unofficial NSP files. Reboot your console to apply them.
description.pack:
◆ AtmoPack-Vanilla is a lightweight pack designed to easyly and safely hack your Swich. It provides several usefull homebrews.
◆ Current pack version :
description.pack_beta:
◆ AtmoPack-Vanilla now has a beta version that allows you to test the latest features. Be aware that this beta version is still in developpement and can have issues. 
 Current pack version :
description.firmwares:
◆ Firmware archived at 'https://github.com/THZoria/NX_Firmware'. Once downloaded, it will be extracted to '/firmware'. You can then install the update with Daybreak.
 FW installed :
description.app:
◆ You can update the app you're using on your Switch.
◆ Current app version :

update.theme_installed:
It looks like you have installed a custom theme, it may prevent the system from booting after updating your firmware.
You should remove it before performing the update.
update.apply_cfw: Your console must restart to apply the package update.
update.apply_patch: Your console must restart to apply the sigpatches.
update.apply_app: Homebrew must restart to apply the update.

error.exfat: Your sd card is in exfat format. Using this software may cause corruption due to the instability of the exfat format.
error.links_not_found:
Unable to find a download link, please check that your Switch is connected to the Internet.
If this problem persists, please open an issue on GitHub.

about.thanks:
THZoria for your AtmoPack-Vanilla

SciresM for reboot_to_payload

Team Neptune for your rcm payload

HamletDuFromage for your .nro which helped me

dialogue.launch_daybreak: Do you want to launch Daybreak?
dialogue.delete_theme: Do you want to remove your theme?
dialogue.mariko_model: You're on a patched model, you have to restart your switch to apply the update and restart again to launch hekate

settings.90dns_set_fail: Failed to apply 90dns. Please check if you have a configured internet network.
settings.theme_delete: Theme sucessfully removed. Please reboot to see effects.
settings.theme_delete_fail: Unable to delete theme. Do you currently have a custom theme ?

dialog.overwrite_ini: Do you want to overwrite your current .ini ?
dialog.reboot: Do you really want to restart your console?
dialog.reboot_mariko: Your console is not eligible for a standard reboot because it is a patched model.
